main event: A report documenting an unidentified flying object observation dated 8 Mar 67.
interesting points: The object was described as resembling a very bright star,The size was compared to a man's head,The object emitted bright white light with flashes of red and green,It was observed by twelve individuals,The sighting lasted approximately 10 minutes before the object disappeared to the north.
sighted object: unidentified flying object resembling a very bright star
